quotes.cn: 我突然就覺得自己像個華麗的木偶,演盡了所有的悲歡離合,可是背上總是有無數閃亮的銀色絲線,操縱我哪怕一舉手一投足。
quotes.en: I suddenly feel myself like a doll,acting all kinds of joys and sorrows.There are lots of shining silvery thread on my back,controlling all my action.

quotes.cn: 被擊垮通常只是暫時的，但如果你放棄的話，就會使它成為永恒。（Marilyn vos Savant）
quotes.en: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.

quotes.cn: 不要只因一次挫敗，就放棄你原來決心想達到的夢想。（莎士比亞）
quotes.en: Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effect.

quotes.cn: 想有发現就要實驗，這項實驗需要時間。—《神盾局特工》
quotes.en: Discovery requires experimentation, and this experiment will take time.

quotes.cn: 這世界並不會在意你的自尊，這世界希望你在自我感覺良好之前先要有所成就。
quotes.en: The world won't care about your self-esteem. The world will expect you to accomplish something before you feel good about yourself.

quotes.cn: 當你最終放開了過去，更好的事就會到來。
quotes.en: When you finally let go of the past, something better comes along.

quotes.cn: 我們學著放開過去傷害我們的人和事，學著只向前看。因為生活本來就是一往直前的。
quotes.en: We learn to let go of things and people that hurt us in the past and just move on. For life is all about moving on.

quotes.cn: 絕不要因為怕辛苦而拒絕一個想法、夢想或是目標，成功的路上難免伴隨辛苦。（Bob Proctor）
quotes.en: Never reject an idea, dream or goal because it will be hard work. Success rarely comes without it.

quotes.cn: 我們在人生中會作出許多選擇，帶著這些選擇繼續生活，才是人生中最難的一課。《妙筆生花》
quotes.en: We all make our choices in life. The hard thing to do is live with them.

quotes.cn: 我總是對新的一天充滿喜悅，這是一次新的嘗試、一個新的開始，翹首以待，黎明之後或是驚喜。（約翰·博因頓·普里斯特利）
quotes.en: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
